description: This is a Python source file defining unit tests for checking layer files in a build system, specifically using the unittest module to verify README content, parsing commands, environment setup, build signatures, and layer compatibility in a Yocto/OpenEmbedded environment.

classes.name: CommonCheckLayer
classes.description: A unittest TestCase class that performs various checks on Yocto/OpenEmbedded layer files, including README validation, parsing, environment, signatures, and compatibility checks.

methods.name: test_readme(self)
methods.description: Verifies existence and non-emptiness of README files in the layer directory and performs content checks such as presence of maintainer, patch, and email references.

methods.name: test_parse(self)
methods.description: Runs the 'bitbake -p' command to ensure the layer can be parsed successfully.

methods.name: test_show_environment(self)
methods.description: Runs 'bitbake -e' to verify the environment can be displayed.

methods.name: test_world(self)
methods.description: Checks that 'bitbake world' succeeds, implying that the build system can generate a complete image.

methods.name: test_world_inherit_class(self)
methods.description: Runs 'bitbake -S none world' with specific inherit class options, tests for additional layer parsing errors related to yocto-check-layer.

methods.name: test_signatures(self)
methods.description: Compares current layer signatures against expected ones to detect changes, skipping for non-software layers if configured.

methods.name: test_layerseries_compat(self)
methods.description: Checks that layer collections specify compatible OE core versions.
